status_constants.description: statusColors object maps project status states to Tailwind color classes
status_constants.rationale: Duplicated in 2 components, should be centralized to ensure consistency and reduce duplication

usage_labels.description: usageLabels object maps usage enum values to human-readable labels
usage_labels.rationale: Duplicated in 2 components, should be centralized for consistency

project_filter_type.description: StatusFilter type definition for filtering projects
project_filter_type.rationale: Domain-specific type related to Project, should be co-located with other Project types

filter_options.description: filterOptions array defining available status filter options
filter_options.target: src/lib/constants.ts or src/types/project.ts as const export
filter_options.rationale: Configuration data that should be centralized and potentially type-safe

date_formatting.description: Date formatting using toLocaleDateString() scattered across components
date_formatting.rationale: Cross-cutting formatting utility that should be centralized for consistent date formatting

scroll_to_element.description: scrollToProjects function using getElementById and scrollIntoView
scroll_to_element.rationale: Reusable DOM utility pattern that could be abstracted for general scroll-to-element behavior

keyboard_navigation.description: Keyboard event handlers for accessibility (Enter, Escape, Arrow keys)
keyboard_navigation.rationale: Cross-cutting accessibility pattern that could be abstracted into reusable hooks or utilities

animation_variants.description: Framer Motion Variants objects for animations
animation_variants.rationale: Duplicated animation patterns across components could be centralized for consistency and easier maintenance

data_fetching.description: Raw fetch() call for loading projects data
data_fetching.rationale: Data fetching logic should be abstracted into a reusable API client with error handling, typing, and potential caching

external_links.description: External link button patterns with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'
external_links.target: src/components/ui/external-link.tsx or src/lib/a11y.ts for helper constants
external_links.rationale: Security best practice pattern that could be abstracted into a reusable component or utility

motion_preferences.target: Already using framer-motion's hook, but could wrap in custom hook
motion_preferences.rationale: Consider custom hook useAccessibleMotion() for consistent reduced motion handling

body_scroll_lock.description: Body scroll lock implementation for modal open state
body_scroll_lock.rationale: Reusable pattern for any modal/dialog component that needs to prevent background scrolling

modal_variants.rationale: Generic modal animation patterns could be reused across different modal/dialog components

image_carousel_logic.description: Image carousel state management and navigation logic
image_carousel_logic.rationale: Reusable carousel logic that could be applied to any image gallery component

mobile_breakpoint.rationale: Configuration constant that should be centralized and potentially shared across responsive utilities

filter_projects.description: Project filtering logic by status and search query
filter_projects.rationale: Business logic that could be tested independently and reused across different views
